mapper.select: select mov.mov_ID,mov.emp_ID,emp.emp_name, mov.before_dep, dep1.dep_name as before_depname, mov.after_dep, dep2.dep_name as after_depname,mov.before_pos, pos1.pos_name as before_posname, mov.after_pos, pos2.pos_name as after_posname, mov.mov_date, mov.reason,mov.movtype from employmov mov JOIN department dep1 ON mov.before_dep = dep1.dep_ID JOIN department dep2 ON mov.after_dep = dep2.dep_ID JOIN `position` pos1 ON mov.before_pos = pos1.pos_ID JOIN `position` pos2 ON mov.after_pos = pos2.pos_ID JOIN employee emp ON mov.emp_ID = emp.emp_ID

select mov.mov_ID,mov.emp_ID,emp.emp_name, mov.before_dep, dep1.dep_name as before_depname, mov.after_dep, dep2.dep_name as after_depname,mov.before_pos, pos1.pos_name as before_posname, mov.after_pos, pos2.pos_name as after_posname, mov.mov_date, mov.reason,mov.movtype FROM employmov mov JOIN department depa ON mov.before_dep = depa.dep_ID JOIN department depb ON mov.after_dep = depb.dep_ID JOIN `position` posa ON mov.before_pos = posa.pos_ID JOIN `position` posb ON mov.after_pos = posb.pos_ID JOIN employee emp ON mov.emp_ID = emp.emp_ID WHERE mov.emp_ID = #{emp_ID}

select mov.mov_ID,mov.emp_ID,emp.emp_name, mov.before_dep, dep1.dep_name as before_depname, mov.after_dep, dep2.dep_name as after_depname,mov.before_pos, pos1.pos_name as before_posname, mov.after_pos, pos2.pos_name as after_posname, mov.mov_date, mov.reason,mov.movtype FROM employmov mov JOIN department dep1 ON mov.before_dep = dep1.dep_ID JOIN department dep2 ON mov.after_dep = dep2.dep_ID JOIN `position` pos1 ON mov.before_pos = pos1.pos_ID JOIN `position` pos2 ON mov.after_pos = pos2.pos_ID JOIN employee emp ON mov.emp_ID = emp.emp_ID WHERE mov.movtype = #{movtype}
mapper.insert: insert into employmov(mov_ID, emp_ID, before_dep, after_dep, before_pos, after_pos, mov_date, reason) values (#{mov_ID}, #{emp_ID}, #{before_dep}, #{after_dep}, #{before_pos}, #{after_pos},#{mov_date}, #{reason})
